## Hints.ExplanationRegistry.getExplanationAtLevel() method

Gets a specific explanation at the requested level.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getExplanationAtLevel(hint: IHint, level: ExplanationLevel, state: PuzzleState): Result<IHintExplanation>;
```
